<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rebel's Map](/Feats.aspx?ID=4135) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 79</row>

**Archetypes** [Horizon Walker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=63), [Scout](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=73) (Level 4)

**Prerequisites**
[Horizon Walker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1987) or [Scout Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2047)

**Access**
Members of the Firebrands at the rank of second mark or higher have access to this feat.

**Trigger**
You roll initiative.

</column>

---

Rebellions require an intricate knowledge of one's surroundings—because you might need to escape at any moment. You remember the locations of escape routes, ambush spots, and cover from a scouting expedition or a previous visit to the area. Roll a d20. At any point during the subsequent combat, you can substitute the result of this roll instead of rolling a d20 on one [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) check to [Create a Diversion](/Actions.aspx?ID=45) or on one [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) check to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62).
name: Rebel's Map
prerequisite: Horizon Walker Dedication or Scout Dedication
